short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Dark Mode to your Flow Edit Screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to put the Microsoft Flow Editor in Dark Mode.  Only targets US instances of Flow.  Fun proof of concept that will likely improve over time.  As-is.  Source can be found on my GitHub:  https://github.com/aprildunnam/
